Unnamed: 4: Other adjustments to consolidated net income includes one off items below the Net income from continuing operations.

Unnamed: 4: Other adjustments to net income to common includes any other allocations of net income to the company to other stakeholders whose claims are higher than those of the common shareholder.

Unnamed: 4: Other gains and losses are due to various events that require recognition of income or losses but are usually one off in nature.

Name: Other Interest Expense
Unnamed: 4: Other interest expense includes all interest not classified in other interest expense tags.

Name: Other Interest Income
Unnamed: 4: Other interest income includes all interest not classified in other interest income tags.

Name: Other Revenue

Name: Short-Term Borrowings Interest Expense
Unnamed: 4: Short term borrowings interest expense includes all interest on short term debt.

Name: Total Cost of Revenue
Unnamed: 4: There total cost of revenue are all costs and expenses related to the production and sale of a companies goods and services.

Name: Total Interest Income
Unnamed: 4: Total interest income is the sum of all interest receive by the company during the period.

Name: Total Non-Interest Expense

Name: Total Operating Expenses
Unnamed: 4: The total operating expenses are the sum of all operating expenses and charges.

Name: Total Operating Income
Unnamed: 4: The total operating income represents the income generated by the operations of the company, not including non operating income/(expense) nor income taxes.

Unnamed: 4: Total other income / (expense) is the sum of interest income and nonoperating income /(expense) less interest expense. This represents the entire amount of nonoperating income / (expense) for the company.

Name: Total Pre-Tax Income
Unnamed: 4: The pre-tax income is the sum of total operating income and total nonoperating income for the company, before taxes.

Name: Total Revenue
